Parks & Recreation

About | History | Links | Parks & Recreation | Maps

One testimony to the beauty of the CHC is the number of cyclists who ride the country roads of the area, especially on weekends.  Trail riding on horseback is also popular.  Parks in the area include:

  • Cochran Mill Park
  • Hutcheson Ferry Park
  • Boundary Waters Park
  • Cochran Mill Nature Center

Community Centers offer a central gathering place to enjoy programs, neighborhood meetings, and club activities. 

Cedar Grove Community House
9285 Cedar Grove Road
Fairburn, Georgia 30213
Map
(404) 762-4058) * Reservations are made through this number at Welcome All Park.

Located just North of the intersections of Cedar Grove Road (Hwy 70) and Cochran Mill Road.

Facilities:

  • Large meeting room
  • Kitchen and serving counter
  • Restrooms

Rico Park (Recreation Center)
6505 Rico Road
Palmetto, Georgia 30268
Map
(770) 463-6303

Located on the West side of Rico Rd. South of the intersection with Campbellton-Redwine Rd.

Facilities:

  • Park Center Building
  • Athletic Field
  • Playground
  • Picnic Shelter
  • Sand Volleyball Court
  • Walking Trail
  • 2 Picnic Tables
  • 2 Grills
Name: Email:

The Chattahoochee Hill Country Conservancy is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit that raises private funds to leverage foundation and governmental grants supporting sustainable development with environmental protection.
